settings.title: Greek Embassy Medical
settings.subtitle:
Affordable and same day Greek embassy medical certificates. We are an authorised provider of embassy medicals.

Attend our clinic: 170 Vauxhall Bridge Rd, London SW1V 1DX

settings.title: A medical in 3 easy steps
settings.text1: Select a time online for your Greek medical appointment.
settings.text2: Attend our London, Victoria test centre where you will have a consultation with one of our doctors. This will take between 20-30minutes.
settings.text3: Once we have reviewed you application and results, we will issue you with a certificate for your Greek medical, ususally in 2 - 3 days.

settings.title: What Is a Greek embassy medical certificate?
settings.text1:
As a foreigner seeking employment in Greece, you will likely be required to undergo a medical examination. This is to ensure that you are healthy enough to work and do not pose a risk to public health. The specific requirements may vary depending on the employer, but generally speaking, you will need to provide a clean bill of health from a licensed physician. In some cases, you may also be required to take a tuberculosis test.

If you have any pre-existing medical conditions, it is important to disclose this information to your potential employer upfront. This way, they can determine whether or not you will be able to perform the duties of the job in question. Failure to disclose relevant information could result in termination of your contract down the line.
settings.text2: It is worth noting that, in Greece, all employees are entitled to free health care. This includes regular check-ups, as well as treatment for any illness or injury that may occur during the course of your employment. If you require any specialised care, such as dental work or mental health services, you will likely have to pay out of pocket for these expenses. However, basic health care is covered by the state-run health insurance system.

settings.title: Authorised by embassies
settings.text: Welzo only works with verified doctors and clinics authorised by embassies such as Harley Medic International.

settings.title: Price matched
settings.text: We price match all of our medicals. This guarantees we are the most affordable on the market.

settings.title: Efficient and Fast
settings.text: We offer same day appointments and express results and certificate for issuance.

settings.title: We Are The UK's Leading Medical Provider
Where can I book my  medical?
settings.text: Booking a visa medical is a straightforward process. Simply head to the contact us page by clicking here. Once you complete the contact us form, we will get in touch with you via email within 30 minutes to organise your appointment.

settings.title: How much does a greek embassy medical cost?
settings.text: We offer the most affordable visa medicals on the market. Prices usually start from as low as £49 all the way up to £250 depending on the requirements for your travel destination.

settings.title: How long does a Greek medical take?
settings.text: Depending on your travel destination, the condition for your medical will vary. However, the average appointment time is 30 minutes.

settings.title: Are these medicals authorised for work abroad?
settings.text: Yes we work with GMC registered doctors and all of them are registered with the FCO.

settings.title: What tests are carried out with the medical?
settings.text: The tests carried out depend on the country you are travelling to. Each country has its own set of testing requirements, but we are aware of the conditions and will make sure that they comply. These tests usually involve a consultation with our doctors to check your ear, sight, and chest, followed by blood work and potentially an x-ray.
